note:
- Milo - Finnish-Karelian digital artist, non-binary (ADHD) person, creator of Idiopathic Hypersomnia awareness-comic, game asset artist, and game narrative script writer.

Also indie author "Mara Reboi". Mara like a form of nightmare, and a fox in karelian, as I create stories with mix of horror, fantasy, sci-fi, and LGBTQAI+ themes.

My commissions are open for book covers, game assets from pixel to 2D and UI, character art, game narrative scripts, and more at: hiisikoloart@gmail.com
